Package net.minecraftforge.items.wrapper

Class EntityArmorInvWrapper

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.items.wrapper.EntityEquipmentInvWrapper
net.minecraftforge.items.wrapper.EntityArmorInvWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
IItemHandler, IItemHandlerModifiable
public class EntityArmorInvWrapper extends EntityEquipmentInvWrapper
Exposes the armor inventory of an LivingEntity as an IItemHandler using LivingEntity.getItemBySlot(EquipmentSlot) and LivingEntity.setItemSlot(EquipmentSlot, ItemStack).
